body: Just Checked My Profile Yesterday And I Was 200 Something.. Woke Up This Morning To  Be In The 500's For The All Time Leaderboard.. What The Crap Is Going On?! Anyone Else Drop A Bunch?

title: Leaderboard Drop

You can check your "actual" leaderboard place by going to the "leaderboard" section of the website and just going through the pages to find yourself.

Currently I'm in the high 140s, I believe.

replies.body:
This is what I used to do to see what place I was in.


I looked myself up on the leader boards to see what level I was.  I then scrolled through the pages to find that level to see what place I was in.   Hope this helped :D
